name: Young Red Dragon Zombie
movement: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 70 ft.
description: A massive, decaying dragon reanimated as an undead creature, it has scaly skin covered in ash and smoldering embers.
memorable: Its two special abilities—Undead Fortitude to continue fighting and powerful Fire Breath that induces fear—make it a unique adversary.
goals: Typically seeks to instill fear and destruction upon its foes using both brute strength and fiery breath.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead creatures, particularly those created by necromancers or in areas with significant death magic.
environment: Often found in desolate, fiery, or volcanic regions, where its elemental powers can thrive.
strengths: High hit points and powerful area-of-effect fire attack, combined with the ability to potentially avoid destruction through Undead Fortitude.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence, making it prone to being outmaneuvered and lacking strategic thinking.
attacks: Multiattack combines a damaging bite and slashing claw strikes, supplemented by a fear-inducing Fire Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, which deals significant damage in a wide area while also frightening targets.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect foes without relying on sight.
skills: Has low passive Perception, make it less effective at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, or sleep due to its Undead Nature.
Low strategic capabilities but extremely dangerous in melee due to high Strength.
Can intimidate foes before they even engage with its Fire Breath ability.
test_queries: large zombie with powerful fire attack
zombie that can fly and climb
